ChemInformant.api_helpers module¶

ChemInformant.api_helpers.fetch_compound_image_data(cid: int) → bytes | None[source]¶

Fetches the 2D image (PNG) data for a given PubChem CID.

Parameters:

cid – The PubChem Compound ID.

Returns:

Image data as bytes if successful, None otherwise.

Raises:

TypeError – If cid is not an integer.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_additional_properties(cid: int) → Dict[str, Any][source]¶

Get additional chemical properties for single CID.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_all_synonyms(cid: int) → List[str][source]¶

Get synonyms for a single CID.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_batch_descriptions(cids: List[int]) → Dict[int, str | None][source]¶

Get descriptions for a list of CIDs in one request (uses XML batch).

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_batch_properties(cids: List[int], properties: List[str]) → Dict[int, Dict[str, Any]][source]¶

Get multiple properties for a list of CIDs in one request.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_batch_synonyms(cids: List[int]) → Dict[int, List[str]][source]¶

Get synonyms for a list of CIDs in one request.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_cas_unii(cid: int) → Tuple[str | None, str | None][source]¶

Get CAS and UNII for a single CID using PUG View.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_cids_by_name(compound_name: str) → List[int] | None[source]¶

Get a list of PubChem CIDs matching a name. Returns None if none found.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_compound_description(cid: int) → str | None[source]¶

Get the description for a single CID.

ChemInformant.api_helpers.get_session()[source]¶

Internal function to get the current session (cached or default).

ChemInformant.api_helpers.setup_cache(cache_name='pubchem_cache', backend='sqlite', expire_after=604800, **kwargs)[source]¶

Configures the cache used for PubChem API requests.

Call this function before making any ChemInformant API calls if you want to use non-default cache settings. This function should be imported from the ChemInformant package level (e.g., ChemInformant.setup_cache(…)).

Parameters:

  • cache_name (str) – Name of the cache file/db.

  • backend (str) – Cache backend (‘sqlite’, ‘memory’, etc.).

  • expire_after (int | float | None | timedelta) – Expiration time in seconds.

  • **kwargs – Additional backend arguments for requests_cache.CachedSession.
